name: Blob Business
description:
-------------------------------------------------
Submission for Global Game Jam 2022
-------------------------------------------------

Now Live The Prime Slime of your Life!

 You live life as a little blob man - and you have to balance his work and social life. Every 'cycle', you choose 7 events which will be completed in order. Each event will have various impacts on your 5 main stats; Hunger Social Energy Money Happiness If any of these reaches 0 (Or in Hunger's case, 100), you lose the game! Think carefully about which events you choose as you won't know their impact until the events are completed - and try and remember their impacts for the next cycle. To do an event, you click and drag it's disc into a slot on the cycle - events are run in clockwise order starting from the bottom.

Credits:

Coffe Cup by Jatmoz from https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1103648

Vista Sounds by Vista-Sound13 from https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1102803

SFX from freesfx.co.uk
